Introduction

Kim Sihun, born Kim Nam Pyo, is a South Korean singer, rapper, dancer and songwriter.

In 2019, Kim Sihun was a contestant in the competition show Produce X 101 but was sadly eliminated in episode 11 after ranking 27th.

He was introduced as a member of Brand New Music's boy group BDC on October 16, 2019. He made his debut with the group on October 29, 2019 with the release of the single "Boys Da Capo". BDC ended up disbanding on August 18, 2023, when it was announced that all the members had terminated their contracts with the agency.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7, which started in October 2024. He was eliminated in the final after ranking 8th place.
